ygData.subject: Re: Analysis Version 2.
ygData.msgSnippet: DarkElf Wizard on my point of view is the strongest OF all wizards.Again,generally DarkElf wizards have higher Agility and Dexterity than highelf and erudites
ygData.messageBody:
DarkElf Wizard on my point of view is the strongest OF all
wizards.Again,generally DarkElf wizards have higher Agility and Dexterity
than highelf and erudites and since this 2 stats are the most impt besides
intelligence,the darkelf wizard simply rocks!

With Ultranight vision,there will be no more porblem at night!

Now down to the faction thingy,DarkElf wizards can choose AGNOSTIC which
means they wont be KOS by humans however will be elves.However,Darkelves
would pass through freeport to get to faydwer,so killing orcs on the way
would enable access to elves territory which thus improves faction with
dwarves,gnomes.Now all races like u :P,and BTW killing orcs does not
decrease ya faction with darkelves...so its a good factionbooster enemy.

Generally,Darkelves hate every single race besides themselves ..duh!So I do
not think much enemies would actualyl lower ya faction with ya guild.

This is through my experience with a DarkElf warrior[I was not KOS in
freeport,riverdale,commons,etc] and a Darkelf Wizard.

Conclusion:Darkelves simply rock once u pass the faction thingy.



Entreri

Email: drizzt@...
ICQ UIN: 2326860
Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
http://www.sg-gaming.net
Your Single Source of Everything Gaming

.plan at
http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=



-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 2:35 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Analysis Version 2.


>From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
>Well... i have a different analysis fer Wiz... instead of Dark Elf... i
>think i will prefer High Elf instead... since they generally have higher
>stats (generally) and well accepted by most races... although they aint
that
>great when comes to INT... but i think High Elf will be my choice when its
>Wizard.... and Dark Elf or Erudite fer Necro since Sereph mentioned that
>imroving faction among the good fellas will reduce yours with the bad
>guys.... i think its a hard part to handle... or perhaps... gnome might be
>the best choice afterall :) or perhaps not fer me... since i prefer to have
>something that 'looks' better in-game... (no offence DF)...
>Also, the most impt stats thast STA n INT fer Wiz... is quite different fer
>Necro... think its DEX n INT fer em... anyway... i guess the impt factor or
>choosing is to have something u like... otherwise i dont think anyone can
>hang there long enough... n perhaps that might take a little of
>experiment... (much like UO, the first char is usually not the best one u
>will have)...
>the Hide thingy is also another interesting factor... well... who knows...
>the Human might be the best in this in the long run.... since they can
>progress faster than anyone else... i guess thats something i have to look
>into...
>
>i think i better get back to work... :)
>Fred
>----- Original Message -----
>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 2:39 PM
>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ
>
>
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>>
>> I've analysed the erudite, dark elf and gnome when I try to make my 2nd
>> wiz. No doubt erudite and dark elf "seem' to have better vital stats for
>a
>> wiz, but if you look at an overall view, a gnome seems to work out
>better -
>> due to the high dex and high agi, which I top them up with 5 stats each
to
>> make them 90. Having high dex, my casting rarely get disturbed, and with
>> high agi, many times I managed to kill my opponents b4 they killed me
when
>> it's a fair fight coz I can avoid their attack and blast them back. The
>> impt stats for wiz is INT and STA, which is where I spend all my 30 stats
>> points when I create my 1st high elf wiz in Innoruuk. H/w, after reading
>> so many player guides in the net, I realised we all missed a very impt
>> point - ie to built AGI instead of STA. Why? Becoz at high lvl, compare
>> putting 5 points in STA and AGI, will u wanna get hit by a monster that
>> delivery a 100 HP dam with the additional 25HP gain due to the 5 STA
>> points, or to stand a higher chance to totally avoid the 100 HP dam? ;)
>>
>> I think EQVault, EQSS, EQlore, EQlizer, EQGuide etc all have very
>> interesting and informative articles on creating chars which worth
reading
>> b4 making a new char ;)
>>
>> Always remember - the game itself has the default vital stats for each
>> class, but we have to consider our playing style as well. Simply
building
>> up based on the vital status may hinder ya survival in EQ :)
>>
>> Mondain (Gnome Wiz)
>>
>> p/s: OK buddy Leshrec, I will join u in making an evil char to wipe out
>the
>> painskin pigs, whahahahahaah! I leave you guys to guess what I'm
creating
>> tonight....maybe a surprise for all when I reach high lvl, heh.
>>

>> > advantage of Hide n Ultravision... :) maybe i need more research as
>> regards
>> > to Erudite n Dark Elf...
>> >
>> > till then...
>> > Fred
